p: T. simplex samples were collected from Izz, Manah, Al-Dakhiliya, Oman, on Monday, September 17, 2018, at approximately 10.00 pm. The collected samples were stored in plastic bags to be transported to the laboratory for research. The morpholocal identification was done by Dr. Syed Abdullah Gilani, Associate Professor, College of Arts and Sciences and the identification number was deposited in the Research Lab. Aerial parts were used. Clean aerial parts were dried at room temperature for 1 week and ground into coarse powder. The powered samples were used for extraction.
